TopicTitle: Moving Game Data folder to help load times

Articles.Content:
Hey, so I was wondering if I can separate my Game Data folder and place it on my SSD? As it stands right now, I have about 75 mods installed and waiting for them to load off my HDD takes a solid 5 minutes to start the game, which compounds when I'm closing the game in between adding or removing mods, or troubleshooting game bugs.

If I can't pull my Game Data folder from the /steamapps/common folder without rendering the game broken, then I suppose I could just move the whole of KSP to my SSD, though i'd prefer to keep whole game files off that drive.
You could move the folder and make a symlink.

Even with whole KSP installed on some descent SSD (Samsung 850 Pro), with 120+ mods load time... Not superfast.

Just make a copy of KSP on SSD and make a test run. With only Gamedata moved effect may be way less impressive.
